values:
so it has been well over a yearr since the last time that i posted something in this thing. i cant exactly put my finger on what made me want to post in this again. i just have a lot of things going on in my life and i figured what better a way to talk about it than via livejournal. im still going strong with kate. everything is great. she is fantastic. i love her with my whole heart. 
        i currently am working for apple computer. i am starting out as a mac specialist. i am really excited. im finding out when the store is supposed to open today. im excited. it should be a fun experience. i also am starting school soon as well. so that should also be a good time. 
        due to the fact that i dont really have too much time to post right now, i'll leave it at that. maybe i'll update again later in more detail or i just might wait another year. we'll just have to see. 

justin

so it has been an extremely long time. wow. well. hey guys. shits good. shit is amazing. i have this girlfriend that is absolutely perfect for me. oh kate the great. she makes me damn happy. the topsiders just finished our cd and is coming out soon. shit is good. im going to maryland soon. i cant wait. like next week. i havent seen any of my family in over a year. im so excited.

blah blah. i gotta go to work. 

justin

so it's been quite a while since my last update. damn. shit has been going down. school is ok... i've had alittle bit of trouble but its nothing i cant fix. :) ebola sunrise is getting really good and we have a show at the downtown on february 1st. :) the topsiders have been doing really well. we also have a show at the downtown on december 14th. these are very big shows and are very important for me. so.. ashley. yea. she kissed me. i am extremely happy about that. i cant even express how happy i am. i've wanted that for a very long time. i forgot about the amazing part of love. :) <3. so anyways. i am at randys house... we are just hanging out. but other than that.. im gonna go. ttyl. 


cheers
justin

so school started.. its pretty decent.. i am in a anew band that i sing/ play guitar in. we're called the topsiders.. like the shoe. its alot of fun. we played the waldbaums show and it was unbelieveble. im getting ready to go record. then im hanging out with ashley :). well yea, andy is here now so i must go.. ttyl.

cheers!
justin

so lately my life is boring.. i need a job very badly. last night i went to johns house and took new myspace pictures because i cut my hair. lol. walked around...ray and carlos picked me up so we drove around for a bit and i criticized rays every driving flaw...even though i dont have any type of lisence. so yea...im hoping to have something to do today.

cheeerrs!
justin

so yea.. good times...lets make a list..

-ashley doesn't want me
-my great-grandma probably isn't going to make it through this weekend
-my friend travis died yesterday
-my mom and i dont get along for shit especially now because my dad is in florida. 

yea...this is a good time.

so last night i made a trip up to west babylon to meet brandon boyd. the guy is like my idol and i love his band so i thought it would be appropriate for me to meet him. the signing was supposed to begin at 7:00pm. which started about 15 minutes late because brandon arrived at exactly 7:00. me, joe, and liz waited outside of the store for about 3 hours on this tremendous line. i also had to buy the book that he put out in order to get an autograph. so $32.69 and 3 hours to talk to him for 30 seconds was worth it. definitely. there were two lines outside. they would call in about 10 from each side at a time. i was the 10th one from my side. which means i got separated from joe and liz. so i walk in the store, take a look to my right and there he is. it was really unreal. i was like..shit hes right there. 5 minutes later, joe and liz came in. i was getting up to the table and gave the camera to one of the guys that worked there so he could take a picture of brandon and i talking. so i walk up, hand him my book, shake his hand and introduce myself. here, i remember the dialog. (kinda pathetic but it made me very happy)

brandon- "hey man how are you doing?"
me- "im doing swell. my names justin. it's really very nice to meet you."
brandon- "well its great to meet you too man."
me- "well, while i have the 30 seconds that i have to talk to you, i should tell you what i need to tell you. you are my idol and i respect and deeply appreciate everything that you do and are."
brandon- "right on man. thank you so much. really."
me- "also i sing in an incubus tribute band and that guy right there ( i point at joe) spins the turntables in the same band."
brandon- "wow, right on. thats awesome dude."
me- "here is a song request from me to you. i love you man, ill see you saturday. it was nice meeting you."
brandon- "love you too man, ill see you then."


so that was my really crammed 30 second chat with brandon. it was really cool. really reeally neat.

yea so i really dont know what to do...i wwas drunk last night in front of her and that was embarrassing because im a complete idiot when im drunk. but i sobered up after a while...kate brought me home at like 2....i got the best sleep of my life..only because i was so unbelievebly tired...i was really excited to go home and sleep in my nice comfy bed...it was nice..i tried calling ashley before. she isnt home..i probably freaked her out last night or something. i dont have anything to do today or this evening...i really wish that was different. oh well..

illin in santiagos room listening to hoobastank because he likes them so yea....its that time of year again when everything gets very hectic with school and regents and shit. 3 regents to take this year...one in particular im stressing about...global. yea.. i need to pass it or i graduate another year late. yea, another one. im already graduating late. so im studying my ass off and get as prepared as i can..i need to call best buy and schedule an interview so ill have a job. i need money this summer. especially because i need a car and such. i need to make some serious rennovations to my drum set as well.. like..all new skins, al new hardware and cymbols. expensive shit. ill be hopefully playing alot of shows this summer. the one on the 30th is gonna be here very soon. it will be a good one though. tripside,dice,dec84,thekooks,humanmagikmarker,alessonbeforedying and a few more...

one prohibited life broke up...which is bullshit. we were getting good too..i send out the best of luck to all three of them. 

human magik marker is going to be playing the last incubus tribute show on the 30th. we have some good original shit that we're gonna bust out with. hope y'all like it. :) yea...

there is this girl...shes great...

thats all for now...but you all know i wont update for a while because i normally dont update that much..

cheers y'all!
justin

THE SHOW NOW NEEDS A NEW VENUE! THE SHOW IS JUNE 30TH! WE NEED LOTS OF SPACE! IF YOU KNOW ANYTHING THAT COULD HELP OUT PLEASE CONTACT ME ASAP! SOMETHINGDESIRE...765-9327...JUSTINES42587@HOTMAIL.COM! PLEASE HELP!

so yea...i've been pretty busy lately...but what high school student isn't busy this time of year? so im just trying to get as much work done as i can...studying has been a big thing too. hah. im hoping that the summer will be good. next year ill be a junior. yea. could have been a senior but oh well. been talking to ashley alot lately. she's really cool. she coming to cali with me. hah. all i know is that im not going to california to live there by myself. so i need to bring someone. i need to order a warped tour ticket. but i need someone to order it for me and ill give whoever it is the money. womp. incubus concert is a month from today. im excited.

it been a while since i last updated. life is currently good. i'm doing my best and trying to get through in school, im in two good bands, and i have an amazing, beautiful girlfriend. maryland was a long trip...two days longer than it originally was going to be. but oh well. im home now. but yea.. life is good.. oh and..the texas chainsaw massacre sucked ass.

yesterday was my birthday...it was nice. i did some shopping...good times at the mall with mom and emily. came home, ate some dinner and did the cake thing...everyone made me cry again this year. damn them. lol. but overall, it was a good day. tehe.

so the show is finally set up and is about ready to go...just a few things that need to be done.. we need a stage...and we just need to get lots of food.

June 30th
opening up at 12
$5 per person.
natasha's greenhouse field in mattituck.

Tripside
Dice
Dec 84
One Prohibited Life
Another Band
Human Magik Marker
A Lesson Before Dying
Cancer of Society
Halliday Experiment

We will be handing out and putting up flyers as well as selling tickets.

so on june 26th, im going to see incubus at nassau coliseum. i cannot fucking wait. their set will be so much better than lollapalooza. i know it. it could be because they played 14 songs at lollapalooza and they'll probably playu like 20 to 22 songs at nassau. ah, it will be amazing.. mommy ordered our tickets yesterday. oh man im so excited.

im sitting in xp right now... no teacher so i get to do whatever i want. so i decided to do something that i havent done in a very long time. yea. so today, my class is leaving for europe. im not going. im poor. lol. whatevs. dont really care all that much though ill probably cry when they leave later. yesterday was funny because i went to dans house because i thought we had band practice and i found dan in bed because he was sick. we didnt have band practice. so we chilled, played video games, smoked, and ate pizza hut. good times. today, emily is coming over and then we are going to mattituck. emily is amazing. yes yes she is. but yea so we are doing a big show in mattituck on june 30th. we're doing it at paulies house because he has a half pipe and a pool in his backyard. its going to be an all day festival type thing. here are some details..

Skate and Swim Fest.
doors open at 12:30 p.m.
show starts at 1:00 p.m.

bands ( *-not definite)
On the Might of Princes*
Tripside
Backup Plan*
Dec 84
Dice*
One Prohibited Life
Human Magik Marker
Evolve

more details will be posted

cheers y'all!
justin

I heard a word from 'on high'
Glare like a light in the sky
It said, "quit blowing each other up"

Voicing so crystaline clear
Some thing's unclean in your ear
When only blood will fill your cup

Hello
I'm trying to focus, but my eyes decieve me
Focus
I'm witnessing history...repeating

It fell like a tear from my eye
Flying machine so up high
Well, there goes the neighborhood

A scene set to singe innocence
Upheave, unhinge, and pit against
Like every made for TV movie should

Hello
I'm trying to focus, but my eyes decieve me
Focus
I'm witnessing history...repeating

Focus. Focus. Focus. Focus.
Focus. Focus! Focus!! Focus!!!
(I can see now)

We are, we know, we see, we think for you!
The who, the what, the when, the where, the why!
We build your young, we built you too, we see you all!

Hello
I'm trying to focus, but my eyes decieve me
Focus
I'm witnessing history...repeating

life is good at the moment i would say.. other than the fact of school being shitty... emily is great...shes just amazing..xwaitingxforxherxtoxbreakxupxwithxherxboyfriendxcorex...yea.. but it's gonna be great... im having alittle hang over..im def still feelin it... not drinking on an empty stomach again. i got to jam with johnny, will, and joe on saturday..amanda came with me. i was so happy because we hadnt jammed in a long time.. we are playing the southold talent show.. should be amazing. cant wait.. so im gonna get back to work....

cheers y'all!
justin
havent updated in a while....been kinda busy..tonight is military ball...im going with emily bridgen..should be a good time.. playing at the downtown next week. should be fun..

what a week what a week... thursday, i went to dans house and slept over.. we were supposed to have laura and amanda sleep over too but they couldnt get a ride...we ended up just watching stupid videos on ebaumsworld.com until like 2 in the morning. friday, laura and amanda came out. we met them and kj and randu at rudys..played some pool..kicked ass..lol went back to dans and we jammed...later on found out that im the drummer of one prohibited life.. cool... amanda had to leave so dan, randu, caroline, kj and i walked her to waldbaums so her dad could pick her up..we left laura at the house so we wouldnt have to sneak her back into the house.... on the way back, randu and dan stole a light from the boat place and then we ran. ha...good times.. then we had to drop it because there was a cop sitting right where we needed to cross the north road which  was pointless because he didnt even look at us. we watched LEON. sick ass movie. soo good. then we crawled into bed around 2:30, 3 ish....realized at about 4 that it was going to take effort to fall asleep... we got caught because dans little sister came upstairs and saw laura sleeping and told dans dad. when he came up...laura ran into the bathroom...dans mom didnt really care. lol.... saturday night, kj, dan, and myself went to see eurotrip....awesome. soo good.. dan and randu slept at my house... we ate pasta and went to sleep...good shit..yesterday, randu left early for work and dan and i hung out with aly and julie...christine and tim stopped by for a while then tim brought dan and i home at 5...dans ride didnt show up so right now, he is sleeping on the couch in my bedroom while he should be at school.. ha... great week.

so im illin' here with dan, kj, randu, and laura....amanda is coming out tomorrow again
yay. 






.. one prohibited life is not done...

sp last night was good and bad... i got to chill with steve before he left which was cool. we're gonna chill more when he gets back. one prohibited life played...despite some fueds, they were great. laura came. i was happy to see her.... everyone was doubting that i would smoke a cigarette so i smoked one... then amanda said she would talk to laura for me and she did....laura likes kj. thats fine.. whatever....but i do know that kj didnt run out in the middle of one of his bands songs durring their to get her phone number like i did. whatever. im just done trying to get girls. i tried weed last night. it was kinda dissappointing but that was because there was not alot so i only hit it once and i got ashed so im gonna try it again sometime....yea..what a night. i woke up at 1:30 today...latest ive slept in a while.

cheers y'all!

so...the show went well.... i shouldnt play when im sick anymore.. i had such a hard time singing last night.... but this really cute girl named laura from riverhead came and we made eye contact alot last night so when she was leaving, i ran out in the middle of one of our songs, so i could get her number. so yea. i also had to turn someone down last night as well. then she was being a bitch about it. and here i am today, not feeling like doing anything. i swear, this has got to be the dumbest holiday ever. maybe since there is a holiday for people that are in love, there should be a holiday for people that arent in love. i dont know, today just sucks.

cheers.

show!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

so now that i've heard evan...i dont think im worried anymore..... we are practicing again today to touch things up.... i think everything will be fine now.. ..

johnny, joe, and myself went to riverhead after practice for dinner last night. we went to pizza hut then to krispy kreme and then to best buy. we were watching dave matthews on the tvs there... so good. so that was my night last night.... probably will be the same tonight..


cheers y'all!

so yea, last night... i stayed up for the grammy's. i prtty much only wanted to see andre do hey ya but it turned out that it was the last performance and now im very tired. but it was so worth it.. i love that song...lol.

this show is going to be tough. i really dont think we are going to be ready because we havent practiced as a whole yet. so we dont even know how well evan can play the songs. im just gonna cross my fingers and hope that it goes good.

so yea. here i am just chillin in microsoft xp class... just finished my assignment so i have the rest of the period to do whatever. being principal was awesome...we didnt do much....started some scheduling and such... it was overall a very good time. lunch was great....my name is now gootanschnad or something...ha.. good times. 

a crow left of the murder is amazing... very different but its great. i love it. we're all very excited about playing this show... we wanna try and keep track of whos coming so if you are coming, just let me or any one else in one of the bands know so we can just expect you.

 but now i have to head off to my next class..



cheers y'all!

so yesterday after school, i went to joes house to hang out for alittle while until johnny was ready to leave...at about 5, we started heading up towards guitar center to get joes mixer and so johnny could get bass strings. i bought fruit shakers. tehe. so after that, we headed back and got into riverhead..we went to best buy to get a crow left of the murder....ahhhhhhhhhhhhhh...soo good.....then when we were waiting for johnny's mom to get back, aly showed up and i was so happy because she was there to buy the cd too!...lol. these two guys that bought the cd came out and  we said to them, thanks for buying our cd! it was good....then i ran out and told them about the show and our band... it was cool. so i got home eventually, watched the bonus dvd that came with the album and then went to sleep.....very good day..

yes so i just woke up and i have alittle bit of a headache. going to mattituck to jam and record tonight and tomorrrow morning. should be fun. we're gonna stop by emily's house to see the room that we are playing the show ing. im pretty excited for the show. we are playing a bunch of songs that we didnt play at funkfest there. oh and incase any of you are interested in going to the show...

emily miller's dads house. (behind ricky's house)
6:30 p.m.
HumanMagikMarker
One Prohibited Life

should be a good time. it should be over between 10 and 10:30.

yea so here i am at 6:38 am eating my cereal while trying to figure out what im going to do aboout vocabulary that is due today that i remembered like 8 seconds ago....maybe ill find someone. just maybe. there's always someone that types it and makes two copies so ill see.

dont ask me about the show because to be honest, i dont know what the fuck is going on anymore....its not in my hands anymore. i dont even really wanna play it anymore but i gotta because its our show.

periods 3 and 4 will suck today if i dont have the vocab

i've been thinking about what i really want to do with my life lately... i gotta make it to where i want to be in life or else i dont think ill be truly happy. i need to have a career in which i am playing music for people that want to hear it. i think that's what i am meant to do. write and perform music for people. so i think from this point on, im gonna really focus on graduating high school and persuing my career with music and art. i think i can make this happen. fuck that. i know i can make what i want happen because i want it so bad that i can almost taste what it's like to be there. friday made me realize that. nothing in the world compares to being on stage for me. when i am on stage performing for people, i feel so untouchable. nothing can bring me down.

i dont wanna talk to you anymore
im afraid of what i might say
i bite my toungue everytime you come around
'cause blood in my mouth beats blood on the ground

one year ago tonight, i gave my heart away. 



other than that, funkfest will rock.. we spent all weekend jamming. 


i hate what my heart does to me. im starting to like someone again. i was involved with her about 2 years ago... and now i want her again. blaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!!!!!!!!!!

so here i am in the library, cutting english class.. i must say this is my first time cutting. its a good time. i have a sub for english and i was late for class so i was about to walk in and then i was like, its so easy for me to cut right now so i did it. lol. today i have to go to the SADD meeting. for funkfest. then im going to mattituck for the rest of tonight and most of tomorrow to rehearse for the show. i hope you guys come. its gonna be a good time. if you like incubus, you should come. remember, if you dont attend southold high school and you want to come, leave me a message with your name, number, and name of your school so i  can put you on the guestlist. it is at the southold elementry school cafetorium. the elementry is right down the street from the jr-sr high school. just so you know. it starts at 7:30...and its 5 bucks at the door. see y'all there!

cheers

so im back...yes back in southold again. i feel good. even though things changed abit. some stupid kids got arrested here for vandalizing the cemetery on monday. idiots. well it feels good to be back.. the show is very very soon. a week from friday. so much to do so little time. but im excited. yes yes i am. but now, im gonna finish doing my english work.

wow. this past year has definitely gone by very fast. i've definitely learned alot of lessons this year. i think i've learned more about myself, other people, and mostly.....love. brianne was the only girlfriend that i had this year. she gave me nine and a half (alittle more than that unnoficially) amazing months. i will always cherrish and remember the memories that we had. it's a shame that things worked out  the way they did. but i will always remember all of it as the best thing that i could have ever done with my life because i learned so much about life, love, and more importantly, myself. this is the first year that i had an open mouth smile for school pictures. i was never ever comfortable with my looks and smile before my relationship with you. and now, because of you, i've come out to be a more confident person. and i wanna thank you for that. i will always love you. forever.
      this past year has been the best year that i've had. it was full love laughter and love, but also pain and agony. more than others. but whenever i think of the year 2003, i will always think of you. you are the only person or subject that i can think of when i think of 2003. 

*by the way, maybe we should hang out. soon. say maybe in about 11 days?

so ive decided to not get the tattoo for a while. im gonna wait and do more thinking about it. i wanna make sure that i really really want it. it would be on my body for the rest of my life, i wanna make sure i really want it. i also dont have the money right now. so yea. im going shopping instead. we all know how justin feels about shopping....hes a shop-o-holic. oh yes.

so today im leaving for maryland. im very happy about that. i need to get away from here for a while. i need to get away from my life here for a while because mostly all it has given me since the last time i was in maryland is stress. im going to try not to go online at all while im there. i need to unplug from here and the people here for a while. i think the only person that i will call is johnny. cuz hes my buddy. kind of like a brother. so yea....im getting more presents while im there. im gonna go shopping. (we all know how i feel about shopping. so im happy.) i get to see alot of people that i havents seen in a while. that also makes me happy. and.......tattoo!!!! yay!!!!!! ill see y'all when i get back!

cheers y'all!
